thread.title: BRIEF-Betacom signs 10.1 mln zloty deal with BOS SA
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Betacom signs 10.1 mln zloty deal with BOS SA

title: BRIEF-Betacom signs 10.1 mln zloty deal with BOS SA
text:
BRIEF-Betacom signs 10.1 mln zloty deal with BOS SA Sept 30 
Sept 30 Betacom SA : 
* Signs 10.1 million zloty ($2.7 million) deal with Bank Ochrony Srodowiska SA (BOS) to deliver maintenance services of IT hardware and software Source text for Eikon: 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 3.7921 zlotys) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
